summary: ICP starter app scaffolded with Motoko backend canister and React (Vite) + shadcn/ui frontend, including Internet Identity auth hooks, backend actor integration, build/deploy templates, and initial generated UI assets.

existing_features.title: Motoko backend canister scaffold
existing_features.description: Core Motoko backend canister added (main.mo) with generated Candid bindings and frontend declarations wiring.

existing_features.title: React (Vite) frontend scaffold with Tailwind + shadcn/ui component library
existing_features.description: Vite React frontend initialized with Tailwind CSS and a bundled set of shadcn/ui components and utility hooks.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication integration
existing_features.description: Frontend hooks/utilities added for Internet Identity login flow and provider enforcement (useInternetIdentity, lint rule).

existing_features.title: Backend actor integration for frontend
existing_features.description: Frontend backend actor typing and access helpers added (backend.ts, backend.d.ts, useActor) to call canister methods from the UI.

existing_features.title: Build/deploy template for ICP (Dockerfile, scripts, canister configs)
existing_features.description: Reusable build-template added including Dockerfile, deploy.sh, canister.yaml files, workspace/package management, and image processing scripts.

existing_features.title: Generated UI image assets included
existing_features.description: Generated static images added to frontend public assets for UI/background use (e.g., valentine background and heart ribbon illustration).

existing_features.title: When the user clicks the "Yes" button, update the success state content to display the exact message: "I love you Motu, Tu mera pyaara baccha h" as the primary (most prominent) success message.

Add a celebratory "lots of kisses" animation that plays when the user clicks "Yes" (e.g., a kiss-mark/lip-print particle shower that spawns many kiss elements and animates them across the screen without blocking interaction).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create Valentine webpage asking “Will you be my valentine?” with Yes/No options; hovering over “No” moves it to prevent clicking.
On clicking “Yes”, display message “I love you Motu, Tu mera pyaara baccha h” and play an animation with lots of kisses.

architecturalNotes: Project includes a full build-template workspace (backend + frontend) with scripts for pruning/resizing images and deployment configuration for ICP.
Frontend uses Vite + React with Tailwind and shadcn/ui components, plus custom ESLint rules to enforce Internet Identity provider usage and avoid problematic query keys.
Frontend-backend integration uses generated Candid declarations and typed actor access helpers.
projectName: Update Yes-click success message and add kiss shower animation
